text: @UN @antonioguterres 1/Talking about solidarity. Brazilian President Bolsonaro is taking the blame for crimes politicians gathered for him. Instead of taking a look & do something to not allow Covid-19 take over, you take the more comfortable side and stay down. You're allowing fake news all over,
